data.eml:eml: First records of the genus Pelionella Kaydan, 2015 in East Asia, with description of a new species (Hemiptera, Coccomorpha, Pseudococcidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tanaka, Hirotaka (2018): First records of the genus Pelionella Kaydan, 2015 in East Asia, with description of a new species (Hemiptera, Coccomorpha, Pseudococcidae). ZooKeys 738: 47-58, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.738.13277, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.738.13277
